column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////While we were enjoying our food
column2: the manager came over and profusely apologized for botching our wait time.  He gave us his card and assured us it would never happen again
column3: and that we could contact him directly for our next reservation.  I was impressed by this
column4: because my friends and I never complained to anyone
column5: we simply asked the hostess a few times how much longer it would be until we could get seated.
